data.author: Eloy Briceno
data.message:
Creates the Steering Wheel Widget (#10)

Signed-off-by: Voldivh <eloyabmfcv@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Franco Cipollone <franco.c@ekumenlabs.com>
Co-authored-by: Franco Cipollone <franco.c@ekumenlabs.com>

data.author: Eloy Briceno
data.message:
Creates the Throttle and Brake pedals Widget (#7)

* Adds basic widget UI

* Adds the backend for the widget

* Modifies the update value method of the brake pedal to the correct one

* Fixes crossover over subscriptions

---------

Signed-off-by: Voldivh <eloyabmfcv@gmail.com>

data.author: Eloy Briceno
data.message:
Creates the Speedometer Widget UI and Funtionality  (#4)

* Adds a draft design of the plugin

* Adds the speedometer gauge and widget design file

* Speedometer UI completed

* Connects min, max and units values with the backend of the plugin

* Gives the ability to subscribe to any topic as long as the last field is a number

* Adds a no units option to the Speedometer widget

* Modifies the unit options

* Removes unnecesary code and comment

* Adds documentation and refresh feature for the topic completer

* Adds a little documentation on new QLineEdit class

---------

Signed-off-by: Voldivh <eloyabmfcv@gmail.com>

data.author: Eloy Briceno
data.message:
Makes the plugin package discoverable (#3)

* New package (not discoverable yet)

* Removes files from folder

* Makes the plugin discoverable

* Deletes unnecesary files for PR

* Deletes unnecesary flags and adds the licence file to the package.xml

Signed-off-by: Voldivh <eloyabmfcv@gmail.com>

data.author: Eloy Briceno
data.message:
Creates a discoverable rqt plugin within the package (#2)

* Creates a discoverable rqt plugin within the package

* Removes unnecessary files

* Adds Licence to package.xml and adds empty line at the end of files.

* Adds the plugin to the visualization tab in RQT

Signed-off-by: Voldivh <eloyabmfcv@gmail.com>
